titleStmt.title: A catalogue of all the cheifest [sic] rarities in the publick theater and anatomie-hall of the University of Leyden, by Gerrard Blancken, which are so set in order that all may easily bee found in their places.
titleStmt.author: Schuyl, Frans.

titleStmt.title: A catalogue of all the cheifest [sic] rarities in the publick theater and anatomie-hall of the University of Leyden, by Gerrard Blancken, which are so set in order that all may easily bee found in their places.
titleStmt.author: Schuyl, Frans.
Blancken, Gerard, ed.
Maersche, Corn. à.

notesStmt.note: Catalogue originally written by Frans Schuyl and edited by Gerrard Blancken.
Latin verse on p. 2 headed: In Anatomicum Theatrum Lugd. Batav. Signed at foot: Corn. à Maersche.
Information as to authorship and editorship from other editions.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
